name: Yakima Community Vaccine Center
info: ***PFIZER VACCINATIONS*** !!!!VACUNAS DE PFIZER!!! Enter fairgrounds through Gate 12 off of Pacific Avenue. Be prepared to show confirmation of your appointment or you may experience a slightly longer wait. Masks are required. Please wear clothing which allows access to your shoulder. Vaccinations at this site are reserved for people who live and/or work in Washington State. All Minors age 17 and Under must go to the Walk-in Tent located by the Admin Building.  Ingresar por la puerta 12 en la avenida Pacífico. Se requieren máscaras. Por favor, use ropa que permita acceso a su brazo. Las vacunas en este sitio están reservadas para las personas que viven o trabajan en el estado de Washington. Todos los menores de 17 años o menos deben ir a la carpa sin cita ubicada junto al edificio administrativo. *** PFIZER VACCINATIONS*** !!!!VACUNAS DE PFIZER!!!
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: The Salvation Army- Centralia Clinic
info:
****This is a JOHNSON & JOHNSON single dose vaccine clinic. **** and is by appointment or walk in. Please note: Johnson & Johnson vaccine can only be administered to individuals 18 years of age or older according CDC requirements. 
This clinic is located at and hosted by The Salvation Army - Centralia in partnership with Lewis County DPHSS, WA DOH and WA National Guard. This is a walk in location. Please let us know if you or someone you are accompanying needs assistance of any kind.  **You should also plan your visit around waiting for 15 minutes in the observation area so we can monitor for any unlikely adverse reactions to the vaccine.** Certain people with pre-identified conditions or past anaphylaxis events may be asked to wait for 30 minutes of observation.

Free language translation services are provided. Video ASL translation is also provided.

Please do not come if you are feeling ill. Please arrive as close as possible to your scheduled time to prevent crowding that will impede appropriate social distancing. - It is best to wear clothes that will allow for access to your upper arm, just below the shoulder.   **Masks are required. If you do not have a mask, one will be provided.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Town Toyota Center
address: 1300 Walla Walla Avenue, Wenatchee WA - Washington, 98801
info:
Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccines are currently available to those 12 or older. 
---- Register in advance or on-site. ----
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Humptulips Valley Church
info: This clinic is held within the Humptulips Valley Church. This a first-dose Moderna COVID-19 vaccination clinic. The Moderna vaccine is currently available to any person 18 years and older. Please bring a face covering to your vaccination appointment that covers the mouth and nose. Everyone receiving a vaccine will be required to stay 15 to 30 minutes under observation post-vaccination.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Delta Direct Care- COVID Vaccine Site
address: 209 E. Main St. Suite# 121, Battle Ground WA, 98604
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Benton Franklin - Kennewick COVID Vaccine Clinic
info: ******Pfizer Clinic***** All patients 12 years old and older can register. If you are 12-17 years old you must be with a parent or guardian or verbal parental/guardian consent. **FOR 2ND DOSE PLEASE BRING YOUR COVID-19 VACCINATION RECORD CARD** For Both 1st and 2nd dose - Please bring your appointment confirmation. Please do not come if you are feeling ill. ---- **Masks are required. If you do not have a mask, one will be provided. Follow posted signage about traffic and parking at the site. **Enter the fairgrounds from 10th Street.** If you have lost your vaccination record card, please go to https://wa.myir.net
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Benton Franklin - Kennewick COVID Vaccine Clinic
info: *****JOHNSON and JOHNSON CLINIC*******Must be 18 years of age or over** Please do not come if you are feeling ill. *Masks are required. If you do not have a mask, one will be provided. Follow posted signage about traffic and parking at the site. **Enter the fairgrounds from 10th Street.**
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Community Vaccination Center at Bellingham Technical College
address: Bellingham Technical College, 3028 Lindbergh Avenue – Building G, Bellingham WA, 98225
info:
Janssen (Johnson and Johnson) Clinic for 18 and older  - Appointments from 6:30 PM to 7:30 PM

Moderna 2nd Dose Clinic for those vaccinated on or before April 20th. Appointments available from 4 PM to 6:30 PM by telephone registration or walk-in.  Please call Vaccine Access Schedulers at 360-778-6075 on Monday through Friday from 8:30 AM to 4:00 PM to schedule.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: SRHD- Fire Station - Emergency Management Services
info: Vaccinations by appointment only.  No Walkins
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Olympic Pharmacy and Healthcare Services - COVID Vaccine Venue
address: 4700 Point Fosdick Drive, Gig Harbor WA, 98335
info:
**THIS CLINIC IS FOR 2nd DOSE MODERNA VACCINATIONS ONLY**
Please bring your VACCINATION CARD from your first dose vaccination.
Please bring your State ID, and if you have insurance, please bring your insurance card or Medicare B card (red, white and blue card). If you received your first vaccination with us, we will not need a copy of your insurance card.
Please do not come to the clinic if you are not feeling well.
Please wear loose sleeved, short sleeved or sleeveless shirt
When you enter Olympic Pharmacy, please follow COVID clinic signs to the back conference/fitting area. This clinic is not in the pharmacy area.
Please arrive as close as possible to your scheduled time to prevent crowding that will impede appropriate social distancing
Please be prepared to wait 15-30 minutes after vaccination for observation of adverse reactions.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.
